c048bf97-1bf6-4cbf-9d2d-181451b55254.description: Badge earners have demonstrated proficiency in communication and demonstration skills using the Plant-Forward Kitchen (PFK) Digital Video Series as a training tool. Earners have completed both theoretical and practical assessments validating their skills in applying the lessons and techniques presented in the PFK Digital Video Series to their organization's specific production and menu requirements. Badge earners are CIA-approved mentors, authorized to prepare their teams for PFK Certification.
c048bf97-1bf6-4cbf-9d2d-181451b55254.name: Plant-Forward Kitchen Certified Mentor

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The Culinary Institute of America is accredited by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET) and is authorized to issue the IACET CEU. As an IACET Accredited Provider, The Culinary Institute of America offers CEUs for its programs that qualify under the ANSI/IACET Standard

badge_template_activities.title: Foundations of Mentorship & Sustainable Learning: Earners have completed coursework -  in The online learning system as a training tool; Creating lasting and productive training relationships; The lexicon of plant-forward food and critique; and Labor force development processes and benefits

Development of Deliciousness as a Skill and Culture: Earners have completed coursework in - Flavor-building techniques; Talking about taste and flavor; The culture of plant-forward delicious; and Understanding critical evaluation of a dish

Operating an Integrated Mentor Program: Earners have completed coursework in - Designing a working model; Practical application of mentorship and training; Weaving learning into the structure of your business; and Teaching and training as a role - being the teacher

Global Cooking Techniques as a Tool: Earners have completed coursework in - Introduction to global cuisines; Bringing global flavors into your repertoire; Driving plant-forward Menus with authentic cooking; Master five plant forward dishes
Earners successfully completed an assessment of their ability to facilitate and critique a cooking demonstration

397de853-8475-4438-8c8d-051962c6ce76.description: Badge earners have demonstrated proficiency in intermediate culinary applications, interpersonal skills, and financial aptitude. Earners have also displayed a sense of responsibility and dedication in all facets of their work. In addition to written and verbal examinations, the ProChef Level II Certification exam consists of practical testing of intermediate level skills including baking, global cuisines, healthy cooking, and garde manger.
397de853-8475-4438-8c8d-051962c6ce76.name: ProChef® Certification Level 2

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The Culinary Institute of America is accredited by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET) and is authorized to issue the IACET CEU. As an IACET Accredited Provider, The Culinary Institute of America offers CEUs for its programs that qualify under the ANSI/IACET Standard

badge_template_activities.title: Earners complete 4 practical assessments in Mediterranean Cuisine, Baking and Pastry basics, Healthy Cooking, and Garde Manger.  Practical assessments are evaluated by CIA faculty members.

Earners complete written assessments in Baking and Pastry Basics, Mediterranean Cuisines and Cultures, Healthy Cooking, Garde Manger, Culinary Science, Front Line Leadership, and Financial Understanding,

9a02b58e-fc51-4690-8f4b-0ab68d369dfd.description: Badge earners have demonstrated proficiency in basic culinary applications, interpersonal skills, and financial aptitude. Earners have also displayed a sense of responsibility and dedication in all facets of their work. In addition to written and verbal examinations, the ProChef Level I Certification exam consists of practical testing of culinary fundamentals including stock, soup, and sauce making; protein, vegetable, and starch cookery; egg cookery, salad and dressing preparation, and plating.
9a02b58e-fc51-4690-8f4b-0ab68d369dfd.name: ProChef® Certification Level 1

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The Culinary Institute of America is accredited by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET) and is authorized to issue the IACET CEU. As an IACET Accredited Provider, The Culinary Institute of America offers CEUs for its programs that qualify under the ANSI/IACET Standard

badge_template_activities.title: Earners complete 3 Practical Exams including a 3-course menu of soup, salad, and entree that is randomly assigned.  Soup will be either a hearty broth, cream, or puree.  Salad will include either a simple vinaigrette, emulsified dressing or creamy dressing.  Entree will reflect one of the basic cooking fundamental methods and will include a sauce, vegetable and starch accompaniments.  During each practical exam, earners will also demonstrate egg cookery, stock making, or specific knife skills
Written assessments in Food and Kitchen Safety, Basic Nutrition Principles,  Basic Culinary Math, Conversions, Ratios, and Yields, Recipe Costing, and Product Knowledge

f3fa1a28-43c7-42a5-b985-fef5b88b7d14.description: Badge earners have demonstrated proficiency in advanced culinary applications, interpersonal skills, and financial aptitude. Earners have also displayed a sense of responsibility and dedication in all facets of their work. In addition to written and verbal examinations, the ProChef Level III Certification exam consists of practical testing Food and Wine Pairing, Global Cuisines, Human Resources Management, and Financial Understanding.
f3fa1a28-43c7-42a5-b985-fef5b88b7d14.name: ProChef® Certification Level 3

alignments.name: ANSI-IACET 2018 standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The Culinary Institute of America is accredited by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET) and is authorized to issue the IACET CEU. As an IACET Accredited Provider, The Culinary Institute of America offers CEUs for its programs that qualify under the ANSI/IACET Standard

badge_template_activities.title: Earners complete 3 Culinary Practical Exams including a 4-course Food and Wine Pairing Market Basket, and Asian and Latin Cuisine practical exams.  All dishes in these assessments are judged at a high level by CIA faculty that have achieved ProChef III or Certified Master Chef.
Earners have successfully completed practical examinations in Human Resources Management and Financial Understanding for Chefs / Advanced Restaurant Finance
Earners have successfully passed written exams in Food and Wine Pairing and Wine Knowledge, Asian Cuisines, and Latin American cuisines.
ProChef® Certification Level 2

10fe87ff-9eac-4d2b-9209-b33e62f7ea96.description: Badge earners have demonstrated proficiency in communication and demonstration skills using the Prochef® Digital Video Series as a training tool. Earners have completed both theoretical and practical assessments validating their skills in applying the lessons and techniques presented in the ProChef Digital Video Series to their organization's specific production and menu requirements. Badge earners are CIA-approved mentors, authorized to prepare their teams for ProChef Level I Certification.
10fe87ff-9eac-4d2b-9209-b33e62f7ea96.name: ProChef® Mentor

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The Culinary Institute of America is accredited by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET) and is authorized to issue the IACET CEU. As an IACET Accredited Provider, The Culinary Institute of America offers CEUs for its programs that qualify under the ANSI/IACET Standard

badge_template_activities.title: Earners complete a role-play demonstration lesson evaluated by a CIA faculty member
Earners present an action plan detailing how they will implement a mentor facilitated training program in their unit(s)
Earners complete a 30 hour course on communication, demonstration, and mentorship skills

77a70d40-faea-4374-bb9b-08e03aa0413c.description: Earners of this badge have taken part in a 5-day hands-on cooking program at The Culinary Institute of America. Topics included Soups, Salads, Protein Cooking, Accompaniments and Sides, Sauces, and Plating and Presentation. This course was designed to enhance participants knowledge of culinary fundamentals and to help participants be successful on the ProChef® Certification Examination.
77a70d40-faea-4374-bb9b-08e03aa0413c.name: NRAEF Cooking Principles

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The Culinary Institute of America is accredited by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET) and is authorized to issue the IACET CEU. Verify our accreditation here https://www.iacet.org/ap/109440/

badge_template_activities.title: Earners participated in a 5-day hands-on advanced cooking course at The Culinary Institute of America San Antonio campus.

3218d3a6-fea5-4f4a-9fc7-688909248517.description: This badge is awarded to people who have successfully completed the Certified Culinary Sales Professional program through the Culinary Institute of America's CIA Consulting department. The program is a 4-month long distance learning program designed to help people who sell to food service companies better partner with their culinary clients
3218d3a6-fea5-4f4a-9fc7-688909248517.name: Certified Culinary Sales Professional (Smithfield)

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The Culinary Institute of America is accredited by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET) and is authorized to issue the IACET CEU. As an IACET Accredited Provider, The Culinary Institute of America offers CEUs for its programs that qualify under the ANSI/IACET Standard

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of 7 distance learning modules including Food and Kitchen Safety, Equipment Identification, Culinary Fundamentals (I & II), Product Knowledge, Purchasing, and Menu Analysis.  Completion of a 5-part Term Assignment, and a Trailing Experience.  Completion of a 3-day hands on On-Campus Experience including kitchen exercises, discussions, and a written test.

869bbcd6-74cf-4679-8290-9e1bbdd065b2.description: Badge earners have demonstrated proficiency in communication and feedback skills using the Plant-Forward Kitchen (PFK) Digital Video Series as a training tool. Earners have completed both theoretical and practical assessments validating their skills in applying the lessons and techniques presented in the PFK Digital Video Series to their organization's specific production and menu requirements. Badge earners are CIA-approved trainers, authorized to train and approve mentors in the PFK program.
869bbcd6-74cf-4679-8290-9e1bbdd065b2.name: Plant-Forward Kitchen Certified Trainer

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The Culinary Institute of America is accredited by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET) and is authorized to issue the IACET CEU. As an IACET Accredited Provider, The Culinary Institute of America offers CEUs for its programs that qualify under the ANSI/IACET Standard

badge_template_activities.title: Foundations of Mentorship & Sustainable Learning: Earners have completed coursework in - The online learning system as a training tool; Creating lasting and productive training relationships; The lexicon of plant-forward food and critique; and Labor force development processes and benefits

Development of Deliciousness as a Skill and Culture: Earners have completed coursework in - Flavor-building techniques; Talking about taste and flavor; The culture of plant-forward delicious; and Understanding critical evaluation of a dish

Operating an Integrated Mentor Program: Earners have completed coursework in - Designing a working model; Practical application of mentorship and training; Weaving learning into the structure of your business; and Teaching and training as a role - being the teacher

Global Cooking Techniques as a Tool: Earners have completed coursework in - Introduction to global cuisines; Bringing global flavors into your repertoire; Driving plant-forward Menus with authentic cooking; Master five plant forward dishes
Earners successfully completed an assessment of their ability to facilitate and critique a cooking demonstration

71ab38b9-872a-4933-8470-2391f82551c9.description: The Rich's ProChef Certification program is a custom certification based on CIA ProChef Level I, with additional skills added. Badge earners have demonstrated all of the ProChef Level I competencies plus additional competencies in Baking Skills.
71ab38b9-872a-4933-8470-2391f82551c9.name: Rich's ProChef Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Day 1 practical exam includes assorted precision knife cuts and egg cookery

Days 2-4  Practical Exam includes a 3-course menu of soup, salad, and entree that is randomly assigned.  Soup will be either a hearty broth, cream, or puree.  Salad will include either a simple vinaigrette, emulsified dressing or creamy dressing.  Entree will reflect one of the basic cooking fundamental methods and will include a sauce, vegetable and starch accompaniments.

Day 5 practical exam includes skills from the bakeshop.  Enriched dough made into different shaped rolls, pate a choux filled with pastry cream and finished with ganache, par baked pie crust, and either a genoise or pound cake.
Written assessments in Basic culinary math, conversions, ratios, and yields, recipe costing, and baking fundamentals

44945175-1cd7-4691-b4e8-4e41582bf8ff.description: Awarded in partnership between the Culinary Institute of America and The Korean Coffee Critics Association. This badge is awarded to individuals that successfully complete a series of online courses and exams, as well as a variety of practical tasting exercises and exams
44945175-1cd7-4691-b4e8-4e41582bf8ff.name: Coffee Critics Association Flavor Master Certification

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of a 17 hour course including instruction on Taste and flavor description, Beer and Spirits, Wine, Nuts and Seeds, Dairy and Gelato, Fruit and Floral, Herbs, Chocolate, chemical, Tea, and Coffee.  Participants also completed a course on introduction to Sensory Evaluation
Completion of written examinations in all of the course activities in addition to a practical evaluation of flavor identification

b7e04301-e96e-4efa-8590-d8e513c654cb.description: Earners of this badge have completed a hands-on and virtual training program in culinary and baking & pastry fundamentals administered by The Culinary Institute of America. Earners have also passed a practical and written examination facilitated by The Culinary Institute of America validating specific competencies in culinary arts and baking & pastry arts.
b7e04301-e96e-4efa-8590-d8e513c654cb.name: Rich's R&D Certification

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The Culinary Institute of America is accredited by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET) and is authorized to issue the IACET CEU. As an IACET Accredited Provider, The Culinary Institute of America offers CEUs for its programs that qualify under the ANSI/IACET Standard

badge_template_activities.title: Earners complete a self guided and instructor facilitated course of study on basic cooking methods, basic baking mixing methods, food and kitchen safety, baking principles, and culinary weights and measures

Earners complete a 10 hour practical exam where they must produce lean dough finished in three different applications including two featuring moist and dry heat examples of garnishes or inclusions; creaming method cookies, rub-in method biscuits or scones, foaming method genoise, and boiled custard pastry cream. Earners also pass written examinations on baking principles, weights and measures, and food and kitchen safety

054fea7b-a3a1-4d82-b237-ecdadc4d41fe.description: This badge is awarded to people who have successfully completed the Certified Culinary Sales Professional program through the Culinary Institute of America's CIA Consulting department. The program is a 4-month long distance learning program designed to help people who sell to food service companies better partner with their culinary clients
054fea7b-a3a1-4d82-b237-ecdadc4d41fe.name: Certified Culinary Sales Professional

badge_template_activities.title: Successful completion of 7 distance learning modules including Food and Kitchen Safety, Equipment Identification, Culinary Fundamentals (I & II), Product Knowledge, Purchasing, and Menu Analysis.  Completion of a 5-part Term Assignment, and a Trailing Experience.  Completion of a 3-day hands on On-Campus Experience including kitchen exercises, discussions, and a written test.

eb5220eb-f905-4404-8f42-23311c66518c.description: 参加者需要通过为期一周的网上课程来取得专业厨师一级证书。该课程包括重要知识点以及专业厨师一级证书考试的所有的笔试内容，只有通过笔试考试后才有资格参加一级证书的实践考试。 Earners of this badge have completed a week-long on-line course preparing them to take the ProChef® Level 1 certification examination. This course includes review information and all ProChef® Certification Level 1 written tests as a prerequisite to the ProChef® Level 1 certification practical exam.
eb5220eb-f905-4404-8f42-23311c66518c.name: 专业厨师预备课程 ProChef® Preparation Course

alignments.name: 国际继续教育和培训2018-1标准 ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: 美国烹饪学院为国际继续教育和培训鉴定委员会成员之一，授权颁发国际继续教育和培训鉴定委员会认可的进修教育证书 The Culinary Institute of America is accredited by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET) and is authorized to issue the IACET CEU

badge_template_activities.title: • 该证书获得者需要成功完成为期一周的网上预备课程的学习。作为课程内容的一部分，学员需要通过多个知识点检测和笔试，作为参加专业厨师一级证书实践考试的前提条件。Badge earners have successfully completed a week-long on-line preparation course. As part of this course they have passed several knowledge checks and written examinations as prerequisites to the ProChef® certification practical Examination
• 该证书获得者需要通过所有的笔试考试，包括食品及厨房安全，基础营养学理论，成本测算以及烹饪数学 Badge earners have passed written examinations on Food and Kitchen Safety, Basic Nutrition Concepts, Costing, and Principles of Culinary Mathematics.

skills.name: 食品处理安全性理论知识

f510dd2b-fb6d-47db-b677-a0b33b6d839c.description: Earners of this badge have completed a hands-on and virtual training program in culinary and baking & pastry fundamentals administered by The Culinary Institute of America. Earners have also passed a practical and written examination facilitated by The Culinary Institute of America validating specific competencies in culinary arts and baking & pastry arts.
f510dd2b-fb6d-47db-b677-a0b33b6d839c.name: Rich's R&D Certification (2023)

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The Culinary Institute of America is accredited by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET) and is authorized to issue the IACET CEU. As an IACET Accredited Provider, The Culinary Institute of America offers CEUs for its programs that qualify under the ANSI/IACET Standard

badge_template_activities.title: Earners complete a self guided and instructor facilitated course of study on basic cooking methods, basic baking mixing methods, food and kitchen safety, baking principles, and culinary weights and measures
Earners complete a virtual practical exam where they must research a formula for a bakery item, prepare and present that item and engage in a self critique of that item.

Earners complete a 10 hour practical exam where they must produce 6 portions of a plated dessert including a main item, frozen item, sauce, and two garnishes. Earners also pass written examinations on baking principles, weights and measures, and food and kitchen safety

d91ddbdd-9525-4133-9bb3-295f9ed43702.description: Badge earners have demonstrated proficiency in the flavors, history, culture, and cuisines of Asia. This badge is earned in conjunction with ProChef Level I Certification.
d91ddbdd-9525-4133-9bb3-295f9ed43702.name: ProChef® Asian

alignments.name: ANSI/IACET 2018-1 Standard for Continuing Education and Training
alignments.description: The Culinary Institute of America is accredited by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET) and is authorized to issue the IACET CEU. As an IACET Accredited Provider, The Culinary Institute of America offers CEUs for its programs that qualify under the ANSI/IACET Standard

badge_template_activities.title: Earners complete 2 practical assessments in Asian Cuisine. Practical assessments are evaluated by CIA faculty members.
Earners complete written assessments on Asian Cuisines

7ca2948c-dee1-4ef9-8bc7-b6677304eed8.description: Badge earners have demonstrated proficiency in baking and pastry skills including product knowledge, production techniques, finishing, and plating. Earners have completed a two-day practical exam evaluated by CIA faculty members.
7ca2948c-dee1-4ef9-8bc7-b6677304eed8.name: ProChef® Baking and Pastry

badge_template_activities.title: Earners complete a two-day practical exam where they are required to bake bread, prepare and finish puff pastry dough, prepare pie dough and make apple pies, prepare stirred and baked custards, prepare and bake cookies, prepare, bake, fill, and finish pate a choux, and prepare bake and finish genoise sponge cake with butter cream frosting and additional decorations
Earners complete written assessments in weights and measures, costing, food and kitchen safety, baking ingredients and techniques, and product identification.

skills.name: Cake Decoration - Basic Piping And Writing

3d0ba70c-d0c2-4404-a33e-077d9bb2f2a7.description: Badge earners have demonstrated proficiency in the flavors, history, culture, and cuisines of the Mediterranean. This badge is earned in conjunction with ProChef Level I certification
3d0ba70c-d0c2-4404-a33e-077d9bb2f2a7.name: ProChef® Mediterranean

alignments.description: The Culinary Institute of America is accredited by the International Association for Continuing Education and Training (IACET) and is authorized to issue the IACET CEU. As an IACET Accredited Provider, The Culinary Institute of America offers CEUs for its programs that qualify under the ANSI/IACET Standard

badge_template_activities.title: Earners complete 2 practical assessments in Mediterranean Cuisine. Practical assessments are evaluated by CIA faculty members.
Earners complete written assessments on Mediterranean Cuisines

bb722a36-5ba8-47b5-9046-217ef137f377.description: Badge earners have demonstrated proficiency in the flavors, history, culture, and cuisines of Mexico. This badge is earned in conjunction with ProChef Level I certification.
bb722a36-5ba8-47b5-9046-217ef137f377.name: ProChef® Mexican

badge_template_activities.title: Earners complete 2 practical assessments in Mexican Cuisine. Practical assessments are evaluated by CIA faculty members.
Earners complete written assessments on Mexican Cuisines
